heroDescriptions: Dynamic and innovative Data Analyst and Full Stack Developer recognized for streamlining operational workflows through the strategic integration of Streamlit with the Twilio API, significantly enhancing communication channels and overall efficiency. Proficient in utilizing Tableau, Power BI, and Qlik for impactful data visualization that empowers informed decision-making and boosts data integrity. Adept at designing engaging portfolio websites with React.js and Sanity.io, focused on maximizing user engagement and ensuring accessibility. Demonstrated expertise in automating complex ETL processes with Python, NumPy, and Pandas, guaranteeing meticulous data management while upholding rigorous QA standards for software releases.

experienceDetails30List1: Cut data processing time by three weeks, optimizing workflow efficiency and accuracy through data parsing and extraction.
experienceDetails30List2: Accelerated project completion by six months, intensifying 400% interest for recruiting events through close collaboration.

experienceDetails30List4: Exceeded data analysis capabilities and extracted valuable insights from textual datasets with SpaCy and NLTK for NLP.

experienceDetails40List1: Boosted organizational objectives and office efficiency by reducing manual data entry by 80% through automation of data collection and analysis using Python, VBA, and SQL.
experienceDetails40List2: Analyzed over 1 million data points and historical data using Excel pivot tables, VBA, and graphs, and creating detailed weekly, monthly, and quarterly reports.
experienceDetails40List3: Revitalized organizational objectives by developing new tools on weekly and monthly basis, leveraging Python, VBA, and SQL.
experienceDetails40List4: Supported efficient operations and minimized disruptions for a team of 50 by offering IT support for office functionality.
